General.Name: Shenzhen Honor Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Honor Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures switching power adapters worldwide. The company offers power adapters, server power supplies, communication power supplies, and power battery chargers under the OULUTONG and ASPOWER brands. Its products are used in office application, set top box, network communication, data center, security monitoring, audio, smart home, financial POS terminal, power tools, consumer electronics, custom power supply, 5G base station, vehicles, and other applications. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: A, B, and C Building, Shenzhen, China, 518000
